alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 19 at 2:20PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of central and northern Arizona. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some areas of light snow will develop behind a cold front passage on Wednesday, causing areas of blowing snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
